caption: The video begins with a male terrorist counting down the minutes before a woman on the top floor of the station passes a communication device to the man on the first floor via an elevator. The terrorist told the man in a communication device that there was a 40-minute time bomb on the first floor and that there were other bombs in other parts of the building. The man was angry and angry, but secretly followed the communication device to find a room. After entering the room, the man's companion was severely controlled and beaten by a strange man, and found that there was a security officer in the room after the rescue. Security personnel also expressed confusion about their status.
